Name: Facundo's Flare
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: So smooth this drink is almost creamy. Vanilla dominates with fruity hints of rum.
History: Created by Bruce Hamilton at Tigerlily in Edinburgh, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of Facundo's Flare contains 205 calories
